title: Chairman of the Hospital Authority reappointed
content_text:
p> The Government today (October 5) announced the reappointment of Mr Anthony Wu Ting-yuk, as the chairman of the Hospital Authority for a term from October 7, 2006 to November 30, 2008. The Hospital Authority, as from October 7, 2006, will comprise a chairman, 19 non-official members, three public officers and a principal officer from the Hospital Authority. The new membership list of the Hospital Authority is as follows �V Chairman
Mr Anthony Wu Ting-yuk, JP Members
